manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stylus Pens for Touch Screens 8 Reasons Why You Need A Stylus Use them in any climate!10 colors:red, black, silver, pink, blue, sky blue, green, yellow, orange, purple Slim body, lightweight with a clip design, so it is very easy to carry anywhere. Clip design, easily clip in your pocket, diary, book, tablet,etc. Capacitive stylus with high-quality and ultra-sensitive works well on all universal touch screen devices. Protect your screen from scratching and keep no fingerprints. Perfect for writing, drawing, taking notes, playing games and other forms of creative expression. Perfect using when typing message on small smartphone with long nails or large fingers, when you have messy hands, or when you're wearing gloves during a cold day
Easy to Carry Clean and Precise Touch Screen Wide Application light and small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These styluses really work!
reviews.reviewText: These are great for using your phone on the outside deck or patio, especially when it's cold and you're wearing gloves. Very sensitive and accurate, easy to use, attractive colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good, basic stylus
reviews.reviewText: The stylus is considerably lighter compared to other pens, which may be an advantage or disadvantage, depending on your preference. The small button at the top of the pen is non-functional, but the pocket clip appears to be fairly rugged. The ‘footprint’ of the stylus can be varied by tapping vertically (large area) or angling which creates a smaller area. Drawing with this stylus will not create precise lines as can be had using a hard drawing stylus. In all, this a very good value for the money and the cost is low enough (in quantity) that it won’t break your wallet if you lose it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pens are made well and work as they are designed to. Yes i would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for the use for my tablet and a good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: They work great. Am very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't last that long
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these because they were inexpensive and there are many in a pack. They work fine until they wear out and then I just toss them and grab another. The tip is kind of blunt and squishy, but they are fine for playing games, using the calculator, checking off lists etc. Not the greatest quality, but were fine for my use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesomely Amazing Stylus Pens!
reviews.reviewText: These stylus pens are absolutely, incredibly, awesomely, amazing! I actually use these pens with my Korg delay analog ribbon synthesizer. The tips are very soft and cause no damage whatsoever to the ribbon synthesizer. The quality of the pen is super stable, yet very light. The rubber tip is very durable. I move the stylus pen sometimes vigorously, and the rubber tip, and the pen itself, hold up perfectly with my playing music. I absolutely love these stylus pens. The colors are beautiful, and they would make an excellent gift for someone who texts a lot on the cell phone, or who uses small synthesizer devices where fingers could seem a little bit too big. I am very, very, very happy with these awesome stylist pens!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Small, light and easy to use. Clip to your shirt or you’ll lose it. Great but! 10 pens cost $4.99, department stores only give you 3 for that price. Give them to your kids, they’ll love them. Buy many cause they will lose them.

reviews.reviewTitle: In case if the skin hurts while rolling finger on phone / iPad … this pen is very helpful!
reviews.reviewText: Quite good stuff at reasonable rate ! Thanks Amazon !
